gui.enchanted_sodium_options.name: Enchanted's Sodium Options
gui.enchanted_sodium_options.option.acce: When enabled, a colored bar will be displayed to the left of the options for each mod
gui.enchanted_sodium_options.option.show: Show mod icons in the config screen
gui.enchanted_sodium_options.option.colo: When enabled, mod accent colors will be used for mod titles in the config screen
When enabled, mod accent colors will be used for config category titles
gui.enchanted_sodium_options.unknown_opt: Report this to Enchanted's Sodium Options!! Do not report this issue to Sodium, %s, or any other mod!

Option '%s' could not be displayed by Enchanted's Sodium Options.
Option type: '%s'
